mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_SEQ , COUPONNAME , DISCOUNT , MAXPRICE , STATUS FROM COUPON
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUPON (COUPON_SEQ, COUPONNAME, DISCOUNT, MAXPRICE, STATUS) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(COUPON_SEQ),0)+1 FROM COUPON), #{couponname}, #{discount}, #{maxprice}, #{status})
INSERT INTO COUPON_LIST (CLIST_SEQ, ID, COUPON_SEQ, EXPIRE, DEFLAG) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(CLIST_SEQ),0)+1 FROM COUPON_LIST), #{id}, #{coupon_seq}, SYSDATE+7, 'N')
